sn7.10:3.1: 10. Bahudhītarasutta
sn7.10:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā kosalesu viharati aññatarasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe.
sn7.10:4.2: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhāradvājagottassa brāhmaṇassa catuddasa balībaddā naṭṭhā honti.
sn7.10:4.3: Atha kho bhāradvājagotto brāhmaṇo te balībadde gavesanto yena so vanasaṇḍo tenupasaṅkami;
sn7.10:4.4: upasaṅkamitvā addasa bhagavantaṃ tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe nisinnaṃ pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāya parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā.
sn7.10:4.6: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato santike imā gāthāyo abhāsi:
sn7.10:5.1: “Na hi nūnimassa samaṇassa,
sn7.10:6.3: Ekapaṇṇā dupaṇṇā ca,
sn7.10:9.3: Ekaputtā duputtā ca,
sn7.10:19.1: Evaṃ vutte, bhāradvājagotto brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn7.10:19.3: Seyyathāpi, bho gotama, nikkujjitaṃ vā ukkujjeyya, paṭicchannaṃ vā vivareyya, mūḷhassa vā maggaṃ ācikkheyya, andhakāre vā telapajjotaṃ dhāreyya:
sn7.10:19.5: evameva bhotā gotamena anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsito.
sn7.10:19.6: Esāhaṃ bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca.
sn7.10:19.7: Labheyyāhaṃ bhoto gotamassa santike pabbajjaṃ, labheyyaṃ upasampadan”ti.
sn7.10:20.1: Alattha kho bhāradvājagotto brāhmaṇo bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ, alattha upasampadaṃ.
sn7.10:20.2: Acirūpasampanno panāyasmā bhāradvājo eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—
sn7.10:20.3: yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajanti, tadanuttaraṃ—
sn7.10:20.4: brahmacariyapariyosānaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi.
sn7.10:20.5: “Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā”ti abbhaññāsi.
sn7.10:20.6: Aññataro ca panāyasmā bhāradvājo arahataṃ ahosīti.
